name: The Story So Far - This Weeks Plan [EP]
description:
The Story So Far have exploded onto the scene, quickly earning a reputation based on their emotional, energetic shows across South Wales, UK. Which advances of their debut EP "This Weeks Plan". Recorded in Wales, UK, produced in Washington DC by Chris Maguire aka The K Theory and mastered by Emily Lazar @ The Lodge in New York City. Flying around the internet "The Story So Far" are quickly becoming the latest 'must like' band on the fertile Welsh scene. This EP carves a new direction in the world of melodic hard rock, it makes Emo more accessible and Power Pop a little darker. All of this is re-inforced by a strong post-hardcore backbone.

YES this is the same The Story So Far from Cardiff, Wales that are now a Pop band.
